item.title: Linux on asus transformer t100ha
item.description: Problems found installing Xubuntu 18.04 on an Asus Transformer T100ha ERROR: GDBus.Error.org.freedesktop.login1 SleepVerbNotSupported Solution: edit /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.confand add the following line: blacklist snd_hdmi_lpe_audio reboot
